channel.title: Example Sanitation Newsbox Feed
channel.description: An example newsfeed you need to provide to participate in the sanitation newsbox circle. For testing and development only. Note: contains only placeholder data.

item.title: The Extremes of Good and Evil (1)
item.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.
item.author: Mia Wong

item.title: The Extremes of Good and Evil (2)
item.description: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.
item.author: Tarryn Campbell-Gillies

item.title: The Extremes of Good and Evil (3)
item.description: Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it?
item.author: Maureen M. Smith
